template.description: Testcase using the PHP simpletest framework
template.name: New PHP testcase

templates.template:
<?php
// define any mock behaviour, the script under test might have "if(!function_defined('F') require('F.php')

// import the script under test

// import testing framework, see http://www.lastcraft.com/simple_test.php
require("../lib/simpletest/setup.php");

class TestX extends UnitTestCase {

	function setUp() {
		
	}
	
	function testA() {
		
	}
	
}

testrun(new TestX());
?>
